io.github.iwyfewwnt.uwutils

Class UwString

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.iwyfewwnt.uwutils.UwString

  • public final class UwString
extends Object
    A string utility.

    UwString is the utility class that provide functionality to operate with strings.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String EMPTY
      An empty string instance.

                                String defaultValue)
        Safely trim the specified number of characters at the beginning and end of string or return a default value.
        Parameters:
        str - string to trim
        diff - number of characters to trim
        defaultValue - default value to return on failure
        Returns:
        default value, empty or trimmed string

      • trimOrEmpty

        public static String trimOrEmpty(String str,
                                 Integer diff)
        Safely trim the specified number of characters at the beginning and end of string or return an empty one.

        Wraps trimOrElse(String, Integer, String) w/ EMPTY as the default value.

        Parameters:
        str - string to trim
        diff - number of characters to trim
        Returns:
        empty or trimmed string

      • trimOrNull

        public static String trimOrNull(String str,
                                Integer diff)
        Safely trim the specified number of characters at the beginning and end of string or return null.

        Wraps trimOrElse(String, Integer, String) w/ null as the default value.

        Parameters:
        str - string to trim
        diff - number of characters to trim
        Returns:
        null, empty or trimmed string

      • trimOrSelf

        public static String trimOrSelf(String str,
                                Integer diff)
        Safely trim the specified number of characters at the beginning and end of string or return the unchanged string.

        Wraps trimOrElse(String, Integer, String) w/ the input string as the default value.

        Parameters:
        str - string to trim
        diff - number of characters to trim
        Returns:
        same, empty or trimmed string

                                  String currBase,
                                  String nextBase,
                                  String defaultValue)
        Safely replace certain characters from the provided string base w/ characters from the next base or return a default value.
        Parameters:
        str - string to convert to the next character base
        currBase - current character base the string represented in
        nextBase - next character base to represent string in
        defaultValue - default value to return on failure
        Returns:
        same or new string, or the default value

                                  String nextBase)
